spiritsExplanation:
The workout's title and description indicate a high-intensity interval training session (HIIT), specifically with 'high intensity 1-minute intervals,' which aligns with the 'High-Energy & Intense' spirit. The playlist, featuring upbeat and motivational tracks like 'Don't Stop Movin'' and 'Everybody Everybody,' adds to the energetic vibe.
